MapManager

Longitudinal dendritic spine analysis

Legacy MapManager-Igor Documentation Desktop Application

macOS Windows All Downloads Getting Started Web Application

Try Live Demo Getting Started Core Backend

An extensible Python computational backend with comprehensive API, notebooks, and scripting.

View Repository Why MapManager? 🔬 Advanced Analysis

Sophisticated algorithms for dendritic spine analysis

🖥️ Multiple Interfaces

Choose between desktop and web applications. Both powered by the same powerful MapManagerCore backend.

⚡ WebAssembly Powered

Web version uses Pyodide for Python performance in the browser

🔧 Developer Friendly

Open-source core with comprehensive API documentation

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
MapManager provides both a desktop and a web app.

The first thing you will do is import a file with raw image data. Before you do that, check the supported-file-formats.

Note

Not sure if we want to use tabs here? Maybe just have different top-level sections for Desktop and Web?

Note: This is an Admonitions. it is added with markdown starting with !!! note

DesktopWeb
  • Download the app for macOS or Windows
  • Run the app
  • Import your image data (see supported file formats)
  • Point your browser to xxx
  • Drag and drop an image file (see supported file formats)

docs.title: Desktop
docs.text:
• Download the app for macOS or Windows
  • Run the app
  • Import your image data (see supported file formats)

docs.title: Web
docs.text:
• Point your browser to xxx
  • Drag and drop an image file (see supported file formats)

docs.title: MapManager Core
docs.text:
Map Manager Core is the backend engine that is used by both the Desktop and Web interfaces.

We provide an application-programming-interface (API) so programming users can extend its features.

This might include:

  • New file loaders
  • Creating new analysis

Please visit MapManager Core Documentation
